comment: I took her class online during the summer. She is always willing to help students and is very accessible to her students.  Take her class!!
Really easy tests and so nice!

Professor Smathers is one of the best teachers on this earth. She is a loving, caring, and respectful professor and one of the most genuine people you'll meet. Her class is super easy and recommend taking her; she breaks down math concepts easily, especially for people who might not be the best at math in general. Caring, don't take advantage of it

if your not really great at math, I feel like she is the best option to choose. I was practically failing the class, had terrible test scores. However, she understood and gave extra credits to help students who may be failing. Just in general a really caring teacher. Please go to her for questions if needed and go to any math tutorials.

Professor Smathers was INCREDIBLE!! I sometimes struggle with math, but she did an amazing job teaching the material, and was very thorough with how she explained things. Attendance is mandatory, but you get 2 unexcused absences. She had study guides that provided extra credit as long as you get an 90 or above on it. 100% recommend prof. Smathers.

1 ALEKS hw a week, 3 tests, and 1 final exam. i'll never be able to express how much i loved professor smathers. never in my life have i had a professor so good at explaining math to those who struggle with it. also, she's absolutely gorgeous.

Amazing professor. She makes the class easy to understand and has a positive, good vibe. With a background in high school math, she's really clear and cares about everyone's success. To get an A: Don't cheat yourself on the homework, attend test review sessions, and put in effort for the exam which is sadly cumulative.

Best math teacher I've had! Answers all questions/emails and lectures thoroughly. Weekly ALEKS homework assignment that can be done in less than an hour, four tests including the final, and drops the lowest test score with the final's grade. Attendance matters, but it's only 5% of your grade, and you're excused for 2 days. TAKE THIS CLASS EASY A.

The best math teacher I've ever had! She explains the content very well and willing to answer questions. She is very kind and cares about the success of her students. Extra credit is given to add points to your next test.
Possibly the best teacher I've ever had! Take her!!

An amazing teacher! It is clear she wants you to succeed in her class! Attendance is not mandatory but highly encouraged, as she does extra credit replacement quizzes at the end of each class. She uploads all of the notes done in class if you're absent though. Make sure you do the homework or your grade will suffer tremendously
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: LOVE HER. wish i could rate her 100000 stars. she's a very pretty, kind woman who makes math feel extremely easy. take her before the spots get filled because trust me, this is who'll save you if you're bad at math. 1 ALEKS homework a week, quizzes, 3 tests, 1 final exam. I'm gonna miss her to death, best math professor I've ever taken in my life.

Truly can't get much better than her as a professor, cares about the success of students by encouraging students to ask questions and answering questions, willing to change how she does lectures or do more example problems if she notices the class is confused on a particular topic, and is very clear in how she explains the process of a problem.

She's a great teacher overall, very easy to understand and will answer any questions asked. Extra credit is given as an option to add points to test grade. Attendance counts towards you grade but it does not heavily impact. Overall she was great just remember deadlines.

LOVE her. So sweet and wants students to understand the material. 4 exams + cumulative final + HW + ALEKS quizzes (lockdown no browser and most you can take twice) and offers 5 bonus points for completing study guide on ALEKS and showing work. She used to teach HS which makes a lot of sense.
love her! great at explaining
A great teacher! Lectures are super helpful and quick, but she cares about your grade and genuinely wants you to pass the class. Tests every few weeks, and homework weekly/so but overall simple!
she was really nice and her lectures made it easy to understand the material. I wish other professors were like her

Attendance is mandatory if you want to understand the concepts. Extra credit if you complete the study guides for the tests. Fairly easy even if you're not a math person, study for the tests! Great teacher, extremely kind, don't take her for granted!
She is amazinggggg!! Confused, she will help, class was super easy and I am not a math person!!!

I took Mrs.Smather for algebra over the summer. She is wonderful and caring, + study guides as opportunities for extra credit. The way she structured the lectures allowed for an efficient learning environment. I'm sure the pace will be different for her fall/spring classes, but she organized the material perfectly for the fast pace summer courses.

She was a kind, pretty, and intelligent teacher. I understood everything taht she taught. She was very consice with the ways she taught. I learned so much from her. She marked six percent for absence but she gave bonus points for our tests! I would highly recommend taking her as your teacher!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Inspirational--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: I had Prof. Smathers for 1101 in the summer. Attendance is mandatory, but you get 2 free absences. Homework isn't accepted late, but you get ample time to do it. Classwork and tests can't be made up, but you get 1 excused classwork grade and your final, which is open note (tests as well), replaces your lowest test grade. Wonderful prof overall.

Professor Smathers is the best math teacher I have ever had. Coming from someone who absolutely hates math, she made me "enjoy" the subject with her easy and thorough explanations. You can tell that she is extremely hardworking and passionate about what she does and I will 100% miss her and attending her class even though it was early morning.

Math 1001. Don't even hesitate. Take her now before she fills up. Funny, caring, and very available. She explains how to do EVERYTHING in the easiest way possible. I would 100% take her again. She lets you use notes during exams. Just do your part and you will ace the class. Would let us out of class early to work and study as needed

Wonderful teacher. Does not mind reexplaining concepts to students who are confused. Tons of extra credit opportunities. Although the math can be difficult at some points, she gives out worksheets and helpful homework assignments to ensure you do the best you can. Would absolutely take her class again.
Sooo helpful and easy class!! Definitely recommend, especially if you are worried about it being a math class!
The class goes fast but she explains it well. It is grated by homework, attendance, quiz, and test.

She is great! She teaches the material in an easily digestible way. ALEKS can be very annoying at points, but it is not her fault. She emails back very quickly and overall I enjoyed the class. You get to have a notecard for most tests which is extremely helpful.

I literally enjoyed this class so much. Prof. Smathers is such a fun teacher and cares about her students. Her material is easy to understand, and her expectations are very clear. She is easily accessible out of class which is a major plus. Would definitely recommend her class.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: literally the best professor ever! she us super sweet and explains things very well in a way that makes math easy, which was never my strong suit. i 100% recommend taking her, shes amazing

one of my favorite professors. professor smathers will answer questions as needed in class and responds quickly to emails. homework is assigned every week but notes are clear and her teaching style is great. class is fast paced but she is willing to do what she can to help. she takes attendance and you are not able to make up tests/quizzes.

Good teacher, she has a clear understanding of what she's talking about. Attendance is not mandatory but you cannot make up a quiz or a test if you miss a day, no matter the reason. She seems to care for her students, but she moves on from subjects rather quickly and lets the homework do a lot of the teaching. Very fast paced class.

Great Professor! Her teaching style is perfect and easy to understand. The notes are very straight forward and very useful for quizzes and test. The homework assignments are very easy and you get unlimited tries. Pay attention in class and you should pass with an easy A, no doubt. Loved this class, recommend 100%!

Took this class and can compare it to a highschool class. Same style of teaching and tests, was good at teaching the material. 4 tests and 1 final equates to around 70% of your final grade. Overall great teacher. She does take attendance and she does have almost weekly pop quizzes or take home worksheets.
rating_tags: Beware of pop quizzes--Test heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: Her teaching style is so amazing. She shows and works through examples. The notes are accessible online to download if you prefer not to write everything down. Her tests and quizzes are appropriate for the content. She uses ALEKS for homework which you normally have a week to complete. The professor is very sweet and kind.
